localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

previous.excerpt:
I've been on reddit for 8 (9?) years, and I've seen hype waves come and go, and
sometimes these waves of hype influence important changes in the world, economy,
and quality of life for some people. GME will be prevalent for awhile, because
this is an ongoing battle. We have to let this happen.

I'm…
